price: Ntuzashukwe n’umudendezo abahakanye bafite ku isi.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
